item.title: Recursive read lock acquisitions not allowed in this mode
item.description: If you are using the following combination of tools: Recursive read lock acquisitions not allowed in this mode.I'm lost on the root cause of this, but it does seem that the project I'm working on has files set to read-only by something regularly, perhaps Visual Studio is trying to make Git more TFS-y by locking things all over the place. Whatever the cause, I've found that the following usually helps:
